input.sentences: a modern art museum is exhibiting a unique installation .
people can interact with a series of tube pairs .
when you pass your hand between the lighted tubes of a pair | the installation reacts .
there is a display on the floor in the middle of the circular tube arrangement .
kids are especially intrigued by the installation .
output.sentences: A rather strange construct in the middle of the room drew the intrigue of people who entered in for the first time.
A man approached to look more closely to see what was going on.
Tubes that glowed with red light ominously blinked and made beeping noises.
In the center, a colorful display of numbers and lights gave hints towards what could be the outcome of pressing a button.
A bold, young girl approacheda red button to press it, unsure of the possible consequences.
